t: Trailer Hitchin’ Rods – HITCH-ROD | Southwest Companies
s: Imagine this! Two rods, 4 feet long, with magnetic bases. Put one on the ball. Put one on the front of the trailer. Line them up in your rearview mirror as you back up. When you see the one on the ball move….STOP. Get out and drop the trailer on the hitch! Hitchin’ RodsTM make that a reality.

s: Hitchin' Rods allow the driver to align up to a trailer for hookup on the first try, without the aid of a friend or a camera. They consist of two rods, 48 inches tall with strong magnetic bases. Once placed, the driver will see them in his rear-view mirror. Alignment is a snap as you back up.
